title: Singer Anita Darian Remembered For Genre-Spanning Career
teaser: Robert Siegel talks to Lynda Wells about her best friend of 47 years, singer Anita Darian, who was known for her wide range of pitch and musical genres. Darian died last week at the age of 87.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
